snippet: ABRAMS--Lauren. Lauren Denise Abrams, 59, of New York, New York died February, 18 2016. Lauren Abrams passed away at her home in San Diego, CA after a long fight with ovarian cancer. She is survived by her husband Jim Howorth, daughter and son Dana Howorth and Tyler Howorth, sisters Vicki and Nancy Abrams. Abrams led large customer service organizations at IMED, IVAC, Alaris and Cardinal Health and was the CEO of Source Refrigeration before her retirement in 2011. A Remembrance Celebration will be held on March 12, 2016 from 2-5pm at the Escondido Center for the Performing Arts. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ABRAMS--Lauren. Lauren Denise Abrams, 59, of New York, New York died February, 18 2016. Lauren Abrams passed away at her home in San Diego, CA after a long fight with ovarian cancer. She is survived by her husband Jim Howorth, daughter and son Dana Howorth and Tyler Howorth, sisters Vicki and Nancy Abrams. Abrams led large customer service organizations at IMED, IVAC, Alaris and Cardinal Health and was the CEO of Source Refrigeration before her retirement in 2011. A Remembrance Celebration will be held on March 12, 2016 from 2-5pm at the Escondido Center for the Performing Arts. 1/3
